name: dsa-trackker
description: A powerful, full-stack application designed to help you master Data Structures & Algorithms by tracking your progress, consistency, and growth using gamification and detailed analytics.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix dsa-tracker-backend" "npm run dev --prefix dsa-tracker-frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix dsa-tracker-backend && npm install --prefix dsa-tracker-frontend
